caption.p: Chemokines and cytokines in TREM1-deficient ( Trem1 −/−) or wild-type ( Trem1 +/+) mice with IPA. Chemokines and cytokines were determined by Luminex assay in lung homogenates from uninfected mice or from mice at 2 (D2), 3 (D3) or 5 (D5) days after intranasal inoculation of A. fumigatus conidia. Values are represented as bar plots with mean ± SEM. P-values were calculated using the Mann–Whitney U test. **, p < 0.01; *, p < 0.05
